stu_tags: LECTURE HEAVY  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  INSPIRATIONAL
comments: Leda is a fantastic professor! She is very passionate about the environment, her students, and teaching. You don\'t want to miss class because in every lecture she goes over important material. Take good notes, go to class, and you will pass easily. I really didn\'t use the textbook at all. She goes over everything you need during lecture.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Respected (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  GROUP PROJECTS
comments: We did a lot of group work in class. I had her for a freshman learning community. So everything that incorporated into a dual class with philosophy. Pretty easy "dual" class overall. Pay attention and do the homework that\'s assigned and you\'ll be fine.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Respected (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)
comments: Leda is amazing. I have taken three of her classes and I really love her teaching style. She\'s passionate about the topics she is teaching and her goal is to help her students understand, so she is great if you need extra help! Her courses are "easy" if you attend all the classes, take notes, and ask questions. She really cares about her students.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Respected (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)
comments: Leda Casey is an incredible instructor. She cares deeply about the subject and helping her students succeed. She understands that a lot of students take Geology to fulfill a science requirement, so she knows not everyone is going to know a lot about the material prior to class. Work hard and go to class and you will be fine. She\'s wonderful.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Respected (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)
comments: She taught both the Lab and the Lecture for the class. She averages your final grade from the two. I thought she was helpful and made the subject enjoyable.

comments: She does not explain material well and I could live with that, but I can\'t pronounce some words correct because of a speech impediment and she pointed out my error in front of the whole class, I was highly offended.
